name: BLINK fandom game: BlackPink
description:
The perfect app for BLINK fandom is in your area!
If you are “BORN PINK” like us, this is a must-have one for you. “HOW YOU LIKE THAT”?



To spread the BLACKPINK vibes globally, the app is completely FREE and currently supports 8 languages, including English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Russian, Indonesian, Malaysian and Vietnamese.



The application is a collection of many different mini-games, of various genres, with BLACKPINK at the heart of the concept.
At the moment, the mini games belong to 4 main collections: action games, art games, puzzle games and games for 2 players.
I will continue to improve this app, so let's be together.
